div.head: 乾濕二癬
div.div: the two types of dry and moist illness

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: the two types of dry and moist illness

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gan shi xuan 乾濕癬 , dry and moist xuan - illness. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry dong bi tu 東壁土：此土摩乾濕二癬，極有效也 , “Smear this soil on the two types of dryness and moisture xuan- illness . The effect is extraordinary”.
